website_summaries.verdict: This certified organic blend is for dogs of all ages, and even picky dogs love it.
pros: Some owners with picky or finicky dogs say their dogs love it
Some reports of smoother and healthier fur after a switch to this food
cons: Some owners report that their dogs got sick after eating this blend

customer_reviews.title: A quality product and our little Pepper gives it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Our little toy poodle is a real picky eater. I am super sensitive in what I will feed her. None of the garbage that one finds in the super markets. Why feed you pet discards from the human food chain? This product has the organic label that appeals to me as chemical free is important. This is the first dog food she has taken to and we have tried many. We do use another canned brand that is also of high quality when we are traveling. I highly recommend this for anyone who has a small breed dog.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper's Keeper

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog that has become very picky. A friend uses this food so I gave some to my dog and she loved it, so I order it. So far so good, my dog is still eating well after 5 days. Before this I was cooking human food for her.
customer_reviews.author: karen Boselly

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Organic
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food but I wish the price would drop a bit.
customer_reviews.author: BKK

customer_reviews.title: Organic!
customer_reviews.text: My very picky eater likes it! He wont eat any other dog food. I expected him to reject this as well. But he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele F.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this for years. Tried new food and he got sick. Lesson learned. This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: Caprice Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best food ever!
customer_reviews.text: It is an organic food for my dogs. I've been buying it for 4 yrs and my dogs love this food. Also their hair looks and feels better.... More smooth and healthy... Everybody have to say something about my dogs.... They look very healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie

customer_reviews.title: It must taste good or she wouldn’t eat it!
customer_reviews.text: My ShiPoo loves this dry food! It’s better than the cheap food with dyes etc!
customer_reviews.author: Lorenda Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for creating this great food.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES this. Thank you for creating this great food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She thinks it's a treat
customer_reviews.text: Our dog prefers human food, I'm glad she eats this food as it provides good nutrition and makes neat little poops. I can't consistently find it locally, so once again Amazon saves the day.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Irish Rose

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my dogs love it. Received quickly, as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: Dog food was good but not happy I had to pay shipping
customer_reviews.author: Anita Wenska

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would not feed my dog anything else this is natural and made right here in the USA
customer_reviews.author: s6198

product_meta.title: Natural Planet Organics Chicken & Oats Adult Dog Formula Dry Food, 5-Pound Bag
product_meta.description: Just like you, your canine companion's health depends on the proper blend of minerals, vitamins, meats, vegetables, essential fatty acids and antioxidants. Natural Planet Organics has taken all the guesswork out of feeding your dog, leaving you with the peace of mind that you are making the best healthy choice for your dog. This is not just another organic dog food. Ingredients: Organic chicken, chicken meal, organic oats, organic barley, organic peas, natural turkey and chicken flavor, chicken fat (preserved with mixed tocopherols and citric acid), organic brown rice, organic flaxseed, calcium carbonate, tomato pomace, organic sunflower oil, potassium chloride, dried brewers yeast, salt, minerals (zinc proteinate, iron proteinate, copper proteinate, cobalt proteinate, manganese proteinate, selenium yeast), blueberries, choline chloride, organic alfalfa meal, organic sunflower seeds, organic pumpkin seeds, organic carrots, broccoli, vitamins (vitamin A acetate, vitamin D3 supplement, vitamin E supplement, niacin, d-calcium pantothenate, thiamine mononitrate, pyridoxine hydrochloride, riboflavin supplement, folic acid, biotin, vitamin B12 supplement), chicory extract, lecithin, lactic acid, sage, L-ascorbyl-2-polyphosphate (source of vitamin C), yucca schidigera extract, garlic, calcium iodate, rosemary extract, yeast culture (Saccharomyces cerevisiae), dried Enterococcus faecium fermentation product, dried Lactobacillus acidophilus fermentation product, dried Aspergillus oryzae fermentation extract, dried Trichoderma longibrachiatum fermentation extract, dried Bacillus subtilis fermentation extract. Natural Planet Chicken and Oats Formula Dog Food is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the Association of American Feed Control Officials (AAFCO) Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for all life stages except for growth of large size dogs (70 lbs. or more as an adult).
feature_bullets: Suitable for all life stages, 5lb bag
Organic Chicken is a source of high quality protein and adds flavor to a diet
Easily digestible, nutrient-rich grain, organic brown rice provides balanced nutrition for your pet
Flaxseed is a natural Omega-3 and 6 fatty acid source that helps maintain a healthy skin and coat, and support healthy joints. 100% compostable packaging, Made in the USA
